#summary Current features the supported by ZNA-HD
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

= Features =

For a list of items currently in development check out the [Roadmap].

Current Features include:
  * Fully functioning GameObject class allow for easy resizing, moving, drawing, collision testing and more.
  * [http://farseerphysics.codeplex.com/ Farseer Physics] converted to work with the Zune. Note: Physics is optional!
  * Modular Design which allows coders to take advantage of specific pieces of the ZNA engine without needing to use others.
